formattedAddress: 528 E 14th St, New York, NY 10009, USA

editorialSummary.text: Cosmetics chain offering brand-name beauty products & supplies, including salon equipment.

originalText.text: Fully stocked Sally's with everything for you beauty needs ranging hair, nails, appliances. Everyone hear is so patient and kind. Thanks Bethany for all of your sage advice and all of the other employees here!

text.text: Fully stocked Sally's with everything for you beauty needs ranging hair, nails, appliances. Everyone hear is so patient and kind. Thanks Bethany for all of your sage advice and all of the other employees here!

originalText.text: Worst experience I will no longer support this company.again after this encounter. I over heard a female employee heckle an elderly customer who seemed confused about some merchandise that was allegedly on the shelf but physically wasn’t and a dark haired Spanish girl behind the register seemed to not want to help her complaining and laughing to her coworker making incentive comments about the lady. The  rude comments were loud enough to get my attention along another customer so we both tried to find the merchandise and sure enough it was not on any shelf just as the elderly lady claimed. Same rude employee refused to help her arguing the merchandise was there not even taking the time to go check until the elderly lady gave up and left. I chose not to purchase anything after that and left and so did the other customer. Shame on this rude employee may karma find you it’s concerning discrimination thrives at this location so I’ll terminate my decade’s long relationship of being a customer to this company.

originalText.text:
Upon entering a voice from the unknown greeted me. An employee pointed to the direction of the inspiring MVP. Ana gracefully came through the isles to my perplexed aid. "Hair colors.", I yelped. My indecisiveness was unintentionally annoying, but she handled me like a champ. Ana got me the Lilac Glow by Strawberry Leopard that I was dared to wear.

Ana said "See you later." Now I was dared to visit Ana soon for another adventure of "A Hair's Journey".

Although written in jest, the review is true.

originalText.text: Sally Beauty Store is fairly new, never crowded and very clean and neat store.  You will find anything from, "Hair Dye" to your favorite "Shampoo & Conditioner", as well as your favorite "Nail Polish" and they have a pretty nice selection of colors to choose from.  For all your beauty needs you can visit this store, you will definitely be pleasantly surprised.

originalText.text: I came in about 2 weeks ago. Aniyah, one of the employees, was incredibly  helpful in finding the right materials for my project. The store was clean, well organized, and well stocked; they had everything I needed. I highly recommend this location
